overview: The first documentary by Kinderfilmfest regular Joya Thome tells the story of two girls on different continents who are connected by social media and their passion for gymnastics: Whitney Bjerken from Georgia/USA is a world-famous YouTuber and gifted singer-songwriter. The sensitive Yara from Neum√ºnster in northern Germany is her biggest fan. As they both navigate the exciting world of social media, they begin to figure out who they are and what they want in life.
tagline: A documentary coming-of-age film about success and loneliness, friendship and first love, queer coming out and the courage to find your own way.
title: One In A Million
